rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: According to the USDA, wild birds can be infected with bird flu and display no signs of illness. The birds [wild birds] can carry the disease to new areas when migrating and can expose domestic poultry to the virus.
